DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; MUST BE A BET
DOC.TEXT: Brazilian fans_danced in the walkways outside the Rose Bowl , covering themselves with flags and singing.Jose Darci of Sao Paulo , who had brought his family , said his enjoyment of Brazil ' s semifinal victory over Sweden made the expense worthwhile . " The final will be Brazil 2 , Italy 1 , " he said . " We ' re going to eat canneloni next Sunday. " HELENE ELLIOTT
